magic.name: Magic Missile
magic.info: A regular magical attack that doesn't miss.
magic.message: ~User~ casts Magic Missile on ~Target~! MAGIC MISSILE, MAGIC MISSILE!!! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! YAY!

punch.name: Punch
punch.info: A series of basic punches that won't miss.
punch.message: ~User~ punches ~Target~ in the face! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

attack.name: Attack
attack.info: A regular physical attack that doesn't miss.
attack.message: ~User~ attacks ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

rest.name: Rest
rest.message: ~User~ stop attacking for a while to restore their mana!

life.name: Song of Life
life.info: A beautiful song that increases team's defense
life.message: ~User~ plays a lovely melody, increasing his team's fortitude

drain.name: Drain
drain.info: A necromancer's touch that drains dead targets of life force.
drain.message: ~User~ touches ~Target~'s corpse and steals his life force.

ruin.name: Song of Ruin
ruin.info: A cacophany of sounds that deals equivalent damage to everyone in battle
ruin.message: ~User~ plays a terrible sound and causes ~Damage~ damage to ~Target~, who now has ~Life~!

ress.name: Ressurect
ress.info: Revive a dead ally using your magic.
ress.message: ~User~ revives ~Target~! ~Target~ gained ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

regen.name: Song of Regen
regen.info: A soothing song that restores health and mana over time to allies
regen.message: ~User~ plays a beautiful song, regenerating health to his teammates!

prejudice.name: Song of Prejudice
prejudice.info: A melancholy song that makes all enemies lose mana
prejudice.message: ~User~'s melancholic song makes his enemies cry and lose mana.

puff.name: Song of Puff
puff.info: A soothing lullaby that puts enemies to sleep, lowering their speed and raising their defense slightly.
puff.messaeg: ~User~ plays a soft song that puts his enemies to sleep.

charge.name: Charge
charge.message: ~User~ unleashes a powerful bash at ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

hidden.name: Hidden Strike
hidden.info: Stay hidden until the time is right... The target is on the move... Kill with one piercing blow... Mission accomplished.
hidden.message: ~Target~ never saw ~User~ until it was too late..A quick, piercing slash and ~Target~ is left with ~Life~ HP after taking ~Damage~ damage.

empower.name: Empower
empower.message: ~User~ focus their mind to improve their physical power!

focus.name: Focus
focus.message: ~User~ focus their mind to improve their power!

roar.name: Berserker Roar
roar.info: Drastically reduces the defense and speed of the user and all enemies.
roar.message: ~User~ lets out a savage roar, causing all enemies to quake with fear.

sprint.name: Sprint
sprint.info: Greatly increases Speed and slightly increases Strength.

tank.name: Tank
tank.info: Greatly increases Defense, but reduces Strength
tank.message: ~User~ is now ready to take any hit!

aimed.name: Aimed Shot
aimed.info: Shoots a strong Arrow with perfect precision.
aimed.message: ~User~ aims at ~Target~ and shoots an arrow! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

toxic.name: Toxic Stab
toxic.info: Stab an enemy with an envenomed weapon. They will take damage each turn.
toxic.message: ~User~ stabs ~Target~ with a poisoned weapon! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is poisoned!

venom.name: Venom Shot
venom.info: Shoots a poisoned Arrow with perfect precision at one target.
venom.message: ~User~ aims at ~Target~ and shoots an arrow! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is poisoned!

stab.name: Backstab
stab.info: Go up to an enemy and stab them in the weak spot!
stab.message: ~User~ goes up to ~Target~ while he isn't paying attention and stabs him in the back. ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

shower.name: Arrow Shower
shower.info: Shoots several arrows to hit multiple enemies.
shower.message: ~User~ shoots several arrows against their enemies, hitting ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

multi.name: MultiShot
multi.info: Shoots several arrows to hit multiple enemies, and won't miss.
multi.message: ~User~ shoots several arrows against his enemies, hitting ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

whirl.name: Whirlwind
whirl.info: Spin at high speeds to attack multiple targets.
whirl.message: ~User~ spins at wild speeds, hitting ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

pierce.name: Piercing Shot
pierce.info: Shoot an arrow that pierces through the target's defenses!
pierce.message: ~User~ shoots a perfectly aimed arrow at ~Target~, piercing their armor! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

weak.name: Weak Spot
weak.info: Shoot an arrow at the enemy's weak point, reducing their abilities.
weak.message: ~User~ shoots at arrow and hits ~Target~'s weak spot! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is weaker now!

trap.name: Hunter's Trap
trap.info: Set a trap for an enemy! Their speed will momentarily decrease while your own strength increases.
trap.message: ~User~ sets a trap for ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is ensnared!

smite.name: Smite
smite.info: Attack that improves own strength and reduces an enemy's magic. Low mana cost.
smite.message: ~User~'s holy might is unparalleled! ~User~ swings his weapon at ~Target~, leaving him mentally crippled! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ lost magic power!

nbreath.name: Necrotic Breath
nbreath.info: An undeads dragon's powerful breath that hits multiple enemies. Doesn't always connect with the enemy.
nbreath.message: ~User~ breathes on ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

heal.name: Heal
heal.message: ~User~ heals ~Target~! ~Target~ gained ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.message: ~User~ heals ~Target~! ~Target~ gained ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

droar.name: Dragon Roar
droar.info: The roar of a dragon, powerful enough to strip the defenses of all its enemies and striking fear while still causing damage.
droar.message: ~User~ roared at ~Target~, inflicting ~Damage~ damage. ~Target~'s defenses are stripped and is quaking in fear!

dbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dbreath.info: A powerful dragon's breath that will bypass any protection a target.
dbreath.message: ~User~ uses his dragon breath on ~Target~! ~Target~, who's armor was ignored, lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

bleed.name: Bleed
bleed.info: A stab that causes the target to lose health over time.
bleed.message: ~User~ stabs ~Target~ with a knife, then twists it until ~Target~ starts bleeding! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is bleeding!

decay.name: Decay
decay.info: Unholy magic that decays the target, causing him to lose health over time.
decay.message: ~User~ touches ~Target~ with an unholy finger, causing ~Target~ to start decaying! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is decaying!

sneak.name: Sneak
sneak.info: Sneak up on the enemy and strike an exposed spot, piercing armor.
sneak.message: ~User~ sneaks up on ~Target~ and stabs him with a knife! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

blast.name: Mana Blast
blast.info: A magical attack that reduces a couple opponent's Mana.
blast.message: ~User~ focuses his willpower and fires a blast of mana at ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ also lost some mana!

holy.name: Holy Light
holy.info: A magical attack that reduces the opponent's Mana.
holy.message: ~User~'s Holy Light hits ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ also lost a bit of mana!

chi.name: Chi Block
chi.info: A focused physical attack that stop the opponent's mana flow.
chi.message: ~User~ punches all of ~Target~'s chi spots, destroying mana! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ will also lose some mana!

strike.name: Chi Strike
strike.info: A more focused version of the chi block that destroys a lot of one opponent's Mana, but does less damage.
strike.message: ~User~ sees ~Target~'s chi spots! ~User~ rushes ~Target~ and hits every single one, draining a huge chunk of mana. ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

plague.name: Plague
plague.info: A plague that makes one enemy lose power momentarily
plague.message: ~User~ casts a plague on ~Target~, making them lose power!

ice.name: Ice Shards
ice.info: A magical attack that makes target more vulnerable.
ice.message: ~User~ summons several Ice Shards and send them flying at ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is more vulnerable now!

gale.name: Gale
gale.info: A magical attack that creates a windstorm and suspends the opponent in the air, making them slow to the point of being immobile, and, reducing physical attacks greatly.
gale.message: ~User~ created a wind storm with its wings and aimed it at ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~ is now slower and less powerful!

fire.name: Fire Ball
fire.info: A magical attack that hits multiple enemies.
fire.message: ~User~ shoots a Fire Ball at ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

quake.name: Earthquake
quake.info: A powerful quake caused by mages that damages a couple enemies.
quake.message: ~User~ breaks the ground with a powerful smash. ~Target~ falls and hits the ground! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.info: A massive inferno that hits multiple enemies. Leaves a slight burn that decreases defense.
inferno.message: ~User~ shoots a Fire Ball at ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~! ~Target~'s defenses were burned!

judge.name: Judgement
judge.info: A powerful burst of holy light surrounds multiple enemies, causing much piercing damage, but the price of power isn't cheap...
judge.message: God answers ~User~'s prayer with a thunderous boom and a blinding light that surrounds ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

lightning.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning.message: ~User~ makes a lightning bolt pass through ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

poison.name: Poison
poison.info: Magically damages opponent slightly and greatly reduces speed.
poison.message: ~User~ sprays a poison into the air! The poison paralyzed ~Target~, who lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

pollencrim.name: Crimson Pollen
pollencrim.message: ~User~ puffs out a weird crimson pollen! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

pollenazur.name: Azure Pollen
pollenazur.message: ~User~ puffs out a weird azure pollen! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

pollensaff.name: Saffron Pollen
pollensaff.message: ~User~ puffs out a weird saffron pollen! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

pollenemer.name: Emerald Pollen
pollenemer.message: ~User~ puffs out a weird emerald pollen! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

deflate.name: Deflate
deflate.info: Increases Str and Spd, decreases Def and Mag.
deflate.message: ~User~ deflates to become faster and stronger, but more vulnerable!

hop.name: Hop
hop.message: ~User~ hops on ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

burrow.name: Burrow
burrow.info: An evasive maneuver to help reduce damage. Reduces Speed but increases Defense.
burrow.message: ~User~ hops on ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

bite.name: Bite
bite.info: A bite made using sharp teeth.
bite.message: ~User~ bites ~Target~! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

crouch.name: Crouch
crouch.info: Raises the user's Spd, Str, and Mag.

pounce.name: Pollen
pounce.info: Accurate attack that slows opponent down.
pounce.message: RAWR. ~User~ pounces on ~Target~! ~Target~ is pinned and slowed down! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ HP and now has ~Life~!

potion.name: Potion
potion.info: Heals a small amount of HP
potion.message: You drank a potion and restored 30 HP!

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.info: A tasty carrot with the leaves still intact. Can be eaten to restore 10 HP
carrot.message: You ate a carrot and recovered 10 HP!

drblood.name: Dragon Blood
drblood.info: The blood from a mighty dragon

catacomb key.name: Catacomb Key
catacomb key.info: A key that opens the door to the catacombs. It is old, though. Using it will surely break it.

f2 key.name: Tower Floor 2 key
f2 key.info: A key that allows entrance to the second floor of the tower.

venom.name: Venom
venom.info: A poisonous potion that deals 30 damage
venom.message: You drank a potion and lost 30 HP!

sword.name: Sword
sword.message: ~User~ strikes ~Target~ with a sword! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ and now has ~Life~!

rock.name: Rock
rock.message: ~User~ strikes ~Target~ with a rock! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ and now has ~Life~!

wizards staff.name: Wizard's Staff
wizards staff.info: The staff of a powerful wizard
wizards staff.message: ~User~ strikes ~Target~ with a staff! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ and now has ~Life~!

staff.name: Staff
staff.message: ~User~ strikes ~Target~ with a staff! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ and now has ~Life~!

elixer.name: Small Elixer
elixer.info: Heals a decent amount of HP and MP
elixer.message: You drank a potion and restored 150 HP and MP!

selixer.name: Small Elixer
selixer.info: Heals a decent amount of HP and MP
selixer.message: You drank a potion and restored 150 HP and MP!

melixer.name: Medium Elixer
melixer.info: Heals a medium amount of HP and MP
melixer.message: You drank a potion and restored 500 HP and MP!

rotten flesh.name: Rotten flesh
rotten flesh.info: It's... erm... rotten flesh! You can eat it, but it won't be good for your health...
rotten flesh.message: You ate a rotten flesh and lost 50 HP!

moldy toast.name: Moldy Toast
moldy toast.info: Moldy Toast is bad for the mind
moldy toast.message: ~User~ strikes ~Target~ with some Moldy Toast! ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ and now has ~Life~!

slime sword.name: Slime Sword
slime sword.message: ~User~ strikes ~Target~ with a slimy sword! Ewww... ~Target~ lost ~Damage~ and now has ~Life~!

troll bow.name: DO YOU EVEN LIFT BOW
troll bow.info: A bow made of the heaviest materials that isn't usable by anyone

berserker staff.name: Berserker Staff
berserker staff.info: A staff that was supposedly made for the wizards of the Golem and Orc tribes. Can be used by warriors as well.

reapers fangr.name: Reaper's Fang
reapers fangr.info: A right-handed crossbow created for archers

reapers fangl.name: Reaper's Fang
reapers fangl.info: A left-handed crossbow created for archers

golem armor.name: Golem Armor
golem armor.info: The armor used by the golems. Said to be more dangerous than the weapons themselves. Usable by warriors and clerics.

bone bow.name: Bone Bow
bone bow.info: An agile bow made of bones.

armor.name: Armor
armor.info: Generic body armor for basic adventurers

udsword.name: Undead Sword
udsword.info: This undead sword is imbued with a dark essence. Usable by warriors, rogues, and mages.

necro sword.name: Necrolord's Sword
necro sword.info: The blade of a Necrolord. Life spirit seems to be imbued with this weapon. Usable by warriors, rogues, and rangers.

necro staff.name: Necrolord's Staff
necro staff.info: The staff of a Necrolord. Life spirit seems to be imbued with this weapon. Usable by mages and clerics.

udarmor.name: Undead Armor
udarmor.info: Hmm... this is heavier than it looks

suit.name: Flesh Suit
suit.info: Oh... Oh why.. Who would make this... WHO WOULD WEAR THIS....?

udshield.name: Undead Shield
udshield.info: This has cool paintings of... skulls?

troll skull.name: Troll's Skull
troll skull.info: The skull of a giant Trolololl

rpollen.name: Red Pollen
rpollen.message: You coated yourself in Dandelion pollen! It tingles!

bpollen.name: Blue Pollen
bpollen.message: You coated yourself in Dandelion pollen! It tingles!

ypollen.name: Yellow Pollen
ypollen.message: You coated yourself in Dandelion pollen! It tingles!

gpollen.name: Green Pollen
gpollen.message: You coated yourself in Dandelion pollen! It tingles!

petal.name: Petal
petal.info: Shield raising HP and Spd, but lowering Def.
petal.message: ~User~ has a Dandelion petal for wonderful defense!

stem.name: Stem
stem.info: Staff raising Mana and Mag, but lowering Str.
stem.message: ~User~ has a Dandelion stem for wonderful strength!

wizard hat.name: Wizard's Hat
wizard hat.info: The hat of a wizard is said to hold more power than the wizard himself. Only for mages.

wig.name: Wig
wig.info: A strange wig. It has no discernable properties.

feather.name: Feather
feather.info: A head feather increasing HP, Def, and Mag.

talons.name: Talons
talons.info: A set of cassowary talons substantially increasing all stats. Usable by the rogue and ranger.

venom blade.name: Venom Blade
venom blade.info: A green sword made of the venoms from various monsters. Crafted for the left hand, and for all classes.

fhammer.name: Feather Hammer
fhammer.info: A hammer made out of..tightly packed bird feathers. It exudes a magical aura. Usable by upgraded clerics and warriors.

ferobe.name: Feather Robe
ferobe.info: A robe woven with high-quality bird feathers that eases casting. Usable by upgraded mages and clerics.

kazoo.name: Silly Kazoo
kazoo.info: A silly kazoo belonging to a child.

harmonica.name: Harmonic Harmonica
harmonica.info: A perfectly sounding harmonica created for musicians.

sitar.name: Sitar of Life
sitar.info: The Sitar of Life is an instrument that enhances the longevity of its musician.

drsword.name: Dragonlord Sword
drsword.info: The sword of a Dragonlord. It holds pure power, but weighs more than it appears.

drbow.name: Dragonlord Bow
drbow.info: The bow of a Dragonlord. The bow itself is one of the most durable in the lands.

drarmor.name: Dragonlord Armor
drarmor.info: Dragonlord armor created to defend against the mightiest of attacks.

drshield.name: Dragonlord Shield
drshield.info: The mighty shield of a Dragonlord. Holds much defense at the cost of speed.

drhelmet.name: Dragonlord Helmet
drhelmet.info: A helmet created for a Dragonlord. Heavy, but tough.

drclaw.name: Dragon's Claw
drclaw.info: A claw bathed in dragon's blood. Is said to never break. Usable by upgraded rogues.

wyarmor.name: Wyvern Armor
wyarmor.info: Wyvern armor created from the hide and bones of a wyvern.

wyshield.name: Wyvern Shield
wyshield.info: A mighty shield created with the toughest part of a wyvern's hide, yet still allowing mobility.

wyhelmet.name: Wyvern Helmet
wyhelmet.info: A helmet created in the image of a wyvern.

wysword.name: Wyvern Sword
wysword.info: A blade found amongst wyverns. Its properties appear strong. Its weight means only the toughest of people can wield it.

wyrobe.name: Wyvern Robe
wyrobe.info: A robe created from the hide of a dragon. Holds mystical properties.

wyclaw.name: Wyvern Claw
wyclaw.info: A left claw obtained from a Wyvern. Enhances speed and strength, as well as defense. Usable by upgraded Rogues.

wingsp.name: Wing Spear
wingsp.info: A spear made from the bones in a dragon's wing. The bone is harder, yet lighter than steel. It appears to hold mystical properties as well.

long sword.name: Long Sword
long sword.info: A long sword for long battles

cotton robe.name: Cotton Robe
cotton robe.info: You killed a lot of rabbits to get this, didn't you?

ork armor.name: Ork Armor
ork armor.info: This armor is heavier than it looks! Only warriors and clerics can wear it.

earth staff.name: Earth staff
earth staff.info: This staff seems like it emerged from the ground itself.

tower f1.name: Tower, floor one
tower f1.info: The entrance and first floor of the Tower. Some old poets and bards tell tales of how mystical forces are at work in the Tower. Only one way to find out. (5+)
tower f1.welcome: You enter the first floor of the Tower. The room is large, yet desolate, except for a small group of people blocking the path of the staircase leading to f2.

group.message: Warrior, Ranger, Mage: Who is it who dares to climb the tower? If you want to go further up the Tower, you'll have to beat us, kid. Prove that you won't just die when things get tough. When you're ready to challenge us, do /t group:battle.
group.notopic: Warrior, Ranger, Mage: You're talking gibberish, kid.

fuck you.message: Warrior, Ranger, Mage: You're nothing but a stupid kid.

battle.message: Warrior, Ranger, Mage: Ready, then? Let's do it.
battle.denymsg: Warrior, Ranger, Mage: We trust you. Go on ahead. Just don't prove us wrong.

tower f2.name: Tower, floor two
tower f2.info: The second floor of the Tower.
tower f2.welcome: Entering the room, you notice a musty aroma in the air. THIS FLOOR IS NOT COMPLETE.

weaponry.name: Equipment Shop
weaponry.welcome: Owner: Do you want to buy anything? Just /talk to me!

owner.message: Shop Owner: Hi, I'm the owner of this shop. If you want to buy or sell something, use /talk owner:buy or /talk owner:sell. I also have some good gossip.
owner.notopic: Shop Owner: Huh, what are you even talking about?

your mom.message: Shop Owner: You want to pick a fight or something?

gossip.message: Shop Owner: I heard a band of traveling bards lost all of their wigs outside. I wonder who'll find 'em...

buy.message: Shop Owner: I can sell you some items. Use /talk owner:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Shop Owner: I don't sell to Warriors
buy.nobuymsg: Shop Owner: I don't have this item to sell!
buy.nogoldmsg: Shop Owner: You don't have ~Price~ Gold to buy this!
buy.acceptmsg: Shop Owner: Here you are! ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold!

sell.message: Priest: I will buy all your potions. Use /talk owner:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Priest: This item is satanic and we won't buy it!
sell.noitemmsg: Priest: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, brother!
sell.denymsg: Priest: Do you even lift, brother? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Priest: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

temple.name: Holy Temple
temple.info: A place for clerics of all kinds.
temple.welcome: Priest: Hello there, child. You can /talk to the Bishop, Paladin, or me to figure out what it is you want to do.

priest.message: Priest: Greetings, I am a brother of this church. I have special items to sell to my fellow clerics to help feed the orphans.

fuck you.message: Priest: No, brother! Do not go to the dark side!

buy.message: Priest: I can sell you some items for the orphans. Use /talk priest:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Priest: I don't sell to Warriors.
buy.nobuymsg: Priest: I wish I had this item, but I don't, brother.
buy.nogoldmsg: Priest: I'm sorry, brother, I need ~Price~ Gold to sell you this.
buy.acceptmsg: Priest: Thank you, brother. Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Priest: I will buy all your potions. Use /talk owner:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Priest: This item is satanic and we won't buy it!
sell.noitemmsg: Priest: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, brother!
sell.denymsg: Priest: Do you even lift, brother? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Priest: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

paladin.message: Paladin: Hello, I am a Paladin. I have high strength and defense and can use more weapons than a cleric can, but have less healing abilities. That doesn't mean I can't use a quick heal to rejuvinate myself or an ally! If you want to be a Paladin, type /talk paladin:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
paladin.notopic: Paladin: What? I'm a paladin, not a doctor!

upgrade.message: Paladin: Congratulations, brother! You are now a Paladin!
upgrade.denymsg: Paladin: Sorry, brother. You need to be level 30 cleric and have 10,000 gold to become a Paladin.

bishop.message: Bishop: Hello, I am a Bishop. I have medium-high magic and defense and can use powerful healing skills and buffs. I don't have as high physical abilities, but I make up for it with some magical skills. If you want to be a Bishop, type /talk bishop:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
bishop.notopic: Bishop: What? I'm a Bishop, not a mind reader!

upgrade.message: Bishop: Congratulations, brother! You are now a Bishop!
upgrade.denymsg: Bishop: Sorry, brother. You need to be level 30 cleric and have 10,000 gold to become a Bishop.

library.name: Arcane Library
library.info: A place for mages of all kinds.
library.welcome: Magician: Hello there, child. You can /talk to the Wizard, Necromancer, or me to figure out what it is you want to do.

magician.message: Magician: Greetings, I am the archmage and librarian of this mighty establishment. I have special items to sell to my fellow mages! Just type /talk mage:buy. If you want to upgrade, do /talk wizard and the /talk necromancer for information.

fuck you.message: Magician: You're lucky I don't turn you into a toad.

buy.message: Magician: I can sell you some magical items. Use /talk magician:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Magician: I don't sell to Warriors.
buy.nobuymsg: Magician: I wish I had this item, but I don't, friend.
buy.nogoldmsg: Magician: I can't sell you this because I need ~Price~ Gold.
buy.acceptmsg: Magician: Thank you, friend. Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Magician: I will buy any item. Use /talk magician:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Magician: This item isn't what we want right now.
sell.noitemmsg: Magician: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, friend!
sell.denymsg: Magician: Do you even lift, friend? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Magician: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

wizard.message: Wizard: Hello, I am a wizard. I have high magic and decent speed, but my main abilities involve my high damage output with skills. I can tear through multiple targets! If you want to be a wizard, type /talk wizard:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
wizard.notopic: Wizard: What? I'm a wizard, not a doctor!

upgrade.message: Wizard: Congratulations, sir! You are now a Wizard!
upgrade.denymsg: Wizard: Sorry, sir. You need to be level 30 mage and have 10,000 gold to become a Wizard.

necromancer.message: Necromancer: Hello, I am a necromancer. I have high health and decent magic, but my main skills involve draining enemy health and mana, particularly from the dead. I can also ressurect a allies with low hp, giving them another chance at life! If you want to be a necromancer, type /talk necromancer:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
necromancer.notopic: Necromancer: What? I'm a necromancer, not a doctor!

upgrade.message: Necromancer: Congratulations, brother! You are now a Necromancer!
upgrade.denymsg: Necromancer: Sorry, brother. You need to be level 30 mage and have 10,000 gold to become a Necromancer.

hall.name: Musician's Hall
hall.info: A place for bards of all kinds.
hall.welcome: Hipster Musician: Hey, man! You can /talk to the Marksman, Guard, or me to figure out what it is you want to do.

musician.message: Hipster Musician: Yo bro, what's good? I'm the local Musician here and I've got a lot of items to sell to my fellow bards! Just type /talk musician:buy. To upgrade, you can /talk poet and /talk rocker to see what you need to upgrade.

fuck you.message: Hipster Musician: Whoa, bro! Chillax! We all friends here.

buy.message: Hipster Musician: I can sell you some items for the orphans. Use /talk musician:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Hipster Musician: I only seal to cool people.
buy.nobuymsg: Hipster Musician: I wish I had this item, but I don't, bro.
buy.nogoldmsg: Hipster Musician: I'm sorry, bro, I need ~Price~ Gold to sell you this.
buy.acceptmsg: Hipster Musician: Thank you, bro. Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Hipster Musician: I will buy any item. Use /talk musician:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Hipster Musician: This item is broken and we won't buy it!
sell.noitemmsg: Hipster Musician: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, bro!
sell.denymsg: Hipster Musician: Do you even lift, bro? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Hipster Musician: There you are, man! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

poet.message: Poet: Salutations, jolly chap. I am a Poet. I don't have any remarkable stats, they're really low, actually... but my main powers come from my music. I love to play peaceful mealodies that heals and buffs my team. They won't ever find themselves without mana! If you want to be a Poet, type /talk poet:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
poet.notopic: Poet: Sorry, fine sir. I can't help you with that.

upgrade.message: Poet: Jolly good! You are now a Poet!
upgrade.denymsg: Poet: Sorry, friend. You need to be level 30 bard and have 10,000 gold to become a Poet.

rocker.message: Rocker: HEYYYYY! I'm a rocker, yeah! I love playing music that will wittle everyone on the field down, but I do have ways to recover my allies' health on account of them not WANTING TO ROCKKKKK. I love destroying my enemies with the power of ROCK AND ROLL! If you want to be a Rocker, type /talk rocker:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
rocker.notopic: Rocker: Hahaha, come back when you've learned HOW TO ROCK!

upgrade.message: Rocker: YEAHHHHHHH, NOW YOU KNOW HOW TO ROCKKKKK!
upgrade.denymsg: Rocker: Sorry, bruddah. You need to be level 30 bard and have 10,000 gold to become a Rocker.

hideout.name: Ranger Hideout
hideout.info: A place for rangers of all kinds.
hideout.welcome: Archer: Hello there, child. You can /talk to the Marksman, Guard, or me to figure out what it is you want to do.

archer.message: Archer: Greetings, I am the best archer in this hideout (with the biggest ego to boot)! I have special items to sell to my fellow rangers! Just type /talk archer:buy. To upgrade, you can /talk marksman and /talk guard to see what you need to upgrade.

fuck you.message: Archer: What! Just who do you think you're talking to? You're lucky I'm a nice guy.

buy.message: Archer: I can sell you some items for the orphans. Use /talk archer:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Archer: I don't sell to Warriors.
buy.nobuymsg: Archer: I wish I had this item, but I don't, friend.
buy.nogoldmsg: Archer: I'm sorry, friend, I need ~Price~ Gold to sell you this.
buy.acceptmsg: Archer: Thank you, friend. Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Archer: I will buy any item. Use /talk archer:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Archer: This item is broken and we won't buy it!
sell.noitemmsg: Archer: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, friend!
sell.denymsg: Archer: Do you even lift, friend? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Archer: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

marksman.message: Marksman: Hello, I am a Marksman. I have pretty good strength and speed, but my other stats aren't so high. My main skills involve sniping, allowing me to almost always hit any enemy (or even enemies!) in my path. I'm no slouch in damage with these snipe shots either. If you want to be a Marksman, type /talk marksman:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
marksman.notopic: Marksman: It seems you missed the point. As a marksman.... I don't.

upgrade.message: Marksman: Haha! Welcome to your new life as a Marksman!
upgrade.denymsg: Marksman: Sorry, friend. You need to be level 30 ranger and have 10,000 gold to become a Marksman.

guard.message: Guard: Hello, I am a Guard. I have higher health and defense than my marksman counterpart, but less speed and strength. While I appear to be a generic tank, I have something the other rangers don't. I can equip all swords and shields worn by the tough warriors, while still keeping my skills with the bow in top shapes. If you want to be a Guard, type /talk guard:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
guard.notopic: Guard: Hahaha, come back when you have something to talk about.

upgrade.message: Guard: Hahaha! Welcome to the brotherhood of the Guard!
upgrade.denymsg: Guard: Sorry, bruddah. You need to be level 30 ranger and have 10,000 gold to become a Guard.

arena.name: Training Arena
arena.info: A place for warriors of all kinds.
arena.welcome: Swordsman: Hello there, child. You can /talk to the Barbarian, Dragoon, or me to figure out what it is you want to do.

swordsman.message: Swordsman: Greetings, I am a mighty swordsman here to help new warriors! I have special items to sell to my fellow warriors! Just type /talk swordsman:buy! To upgrade, you can /talk barbarian and /talk dragoon to see what you need to upgrade.
swordsman.notopic: Swordsman: Hohoho, what is that? Come back when you have a real request, young adventurer!

fuck you.message: Swordsman: What a raunchy adventurer! I like you!

buy.message: Swordsman: I can sell you some items for warriors. Use /talk swordsman:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Swordsman: I don't sell to Warriors. No wait. I do.
buy.nobuymsg: Swordsman: I wish I had this item, but I don't, friend!
buy.nogoldmsg: Swordsman: What do you take me for!? I need ~Price~ Gold to sell you this!
buy.acceptmsg: Swordsman: Thank you, friend! Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Swordsman: I will buy any item. Use /talk swordsman:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Swordsman: This item is broken and we won't buy it!
sell.noitemmsg: Swordsman: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, friend!
sell.denymsg: Swordsman: Do you even lift, friend? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Swordsman: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

barbarian.message: Barbarian: Hello, I am a barbarian. I have high health and attack, but less defenses and more speed than other warriors. My skills involve cutting down groups of enemies before they can hit me. If you want to be a barbarian, type /talk barbarian:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
barbarian.notopic: Barbarian: Sorry buddy, I haven't a clue what you're talking about.

upgrade.message: Barbarian: Congrats, now you're a barbarian!
upgrade.denymsg: Barbarian: Sorry, friend. You need to be level 30 warrior and have 10,000 gold to become a barbarian.

dragoon.message: Dragoon: Hello, I am a Dragoon. I have high defense and strength, but less speed. I can absorb a lot of hits before falling, if I fall at all! I also have the strength of dragons running through my blood, giving me some of their abilities. If you want to be a dragoon, type /talk dragoon:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
dragoon.notopic: Dragoon: Hahaha, come back when you have something to talk about.

upgrade.message: Dragoon: The ritual of the dragon is complete. You are now a true Dragoon!
upgrade.denymsg: Dragoon: You can't be a Dragoon until you are level 30 warrior and have 10,000 to offer me.

center.name: Meditation Center
center.info: A place for monks of all kinds.
center.welcome: Brawler: 'Sup. You can /talk to the chi master, scrapper, or me to figure out what it is you want to do.

brawler.message: Brawler: Greetings, I am one of the best physical specialists here. I have special items to sell to my fellow monks! Just type /talk brawler:buy! To upgrade, you can /talk master and /talk scrapper to see what you need to upgrade.
brawler.notopic: Brawler: Hohoho, what is that? Come back when you have a real request, young adventurer!

fuck you.message: Brawler: What a raunchy adventurer! I like you!

buy.message: Brawler: I can sell you some items for warriors. Use /talk brawler:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Brawler: I don't sell to Warriors. No wait. I do.
buy.nobuymsg: Brawler: I wish I had this item, but I don't, friend!
buy.nogoldmsg: Brawler: What do you take me for!? I need ~Price~ Gold to sell you this!
buy.acceptmsg: Brawler: Thanks! Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Brawler: I will buy most items. Use /talk brawler:sell:itemName for that.
sell.nosellmsg: Brawler: This item is broken and we won't buy it!
sell.noitemmsg: Brawler: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, friend!
sell.denymsg: Brawler: Do you even lift, friend? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Brawler: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

master.message: chi master: Hello, I am a Chi Master. I have lower stats than the Scrapper overall, but my skills are more centered around mana manipulation on the enemy and self. If you want to be a Chi Master, type /talk master:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
master.notopic: chi master: Sorry buddy, I haven't a clue what you're talking about.

upgrade.message: chi master: Congratulations, now you're a chi master!
upgrade.denymsg: chi master: Sorry, friend. You need to be level 30 warrior and have 10,000 gold to become a barbarian.

scrapper.message: Scrapper: Hello, I am a Scrapper. I have high strength as well as decent speed. I can still target basic chi spots, but most of my attacks do high impact damage. If you want to be a scrapper, type /talk scrapper:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.
scrapper.notopic: Scrapper: Hahaha, come back when you have something to talk about.

upgrade.message: Scrapper: Yeah, dog! You are now a real Scrapper!
upgrade.denymsg: Scrapper: Bro. You can't be a Scrapper until you are level 30 monk and have 10,000 to offer me.

den.name: Thieves' Den
den.info: A place for rogues of all kinds.
den.welcome: Thief: Yo, man. You can /talk to the Assassin, Ninja, or me to figure out what it is you want to do with your life.

thief.message: Thief: Yoyoyo, I'm a thief. I have special items to sell that I looted from others! Just type /talk thief:buy. If you want to upgrade, do /talk ninja and /talk assassin for information.

buy.message: Thief: I can sell you some magical items. Use /talk thief:buy:itemName.
buy.denymsg: Thief: I don't sell to Warriors.
buy.nobuymsg: Thief: I wish I had this item, but I don't, friend.
buy.nogoldmsg: Thief: I can't sell you this because I need ~Price~ Gold.
buy.acceptmsg: Thief: Thank you, friend. Here is/are ~Count~ ~Item~(s) for ~Price~ Gold.

sell.message: Thief: I will buy any item. Use /talk thief:sell:itemName for that..
sell.nosellmsg: Thief: This item isn't what we want right now.
sell.noitemmsg: Thief: You don't have ~Ammount~ ~Item~(s) to sell me, friend!
sell.denymsg: Thief: Do you even lift, friend? I don't sell for people with less than 2 Strength!
sell.acceptmsg: Thief: Here you are! ~Price~ Gold for ~Count~ ~Item~(s)!

ninja.message: Ninja: Hello, I am a Ninja of the Ninja Clan... of Ninjas. I have high attack and speed, but my main skills involve high damage over time. I can stack effects on multiple targets, and then stall until they die! If you want to be a Ninja, type /talk ninja:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.

upgrade.message: Ninja: Congratulations! You are now a Ninja!
upgrade.denymsg: Ninja: Sorry, sir. You need to be level 30 rogue and have 10,000 gold to become a Ninja.

assassin.message: Assassin: Bonjour, mon ami, I am an Assassin. I have high strength and speed. My main skills come from my high damage output! The only down side would be that I don't target multiple targets.. But that's fine. I'll kill them in one shot. My strongest ability is my Hidden Strike. No armor can defend against it. If you want to be an assassin, type /talk assassin:upgrade when you have 10,000 gold and are level 30.

upgrade.message: Assassin: Merci, mon frere! Vous es now an Assassin!
upgrade.denymsg: Assassin: Eh.., mon frere, you need to be level 30 rogue and have 10,000 gold to become an Assassin.

inn.name: Inn
inn.info: Allows players to rest and restore HP and Mana
inn.welcome: Owner: Do you want to rest for a night? It will cost you 10 Gold, and it will restore all your HP and Mana. Just /talk to me!

owner.message: Inn Owner: Hi, I'm the owner of this Inn. If you want to spend the night to fully restore your HP and Mana, type /talk owner:inn.
owner.notopic: Inn Owner: Huh, what are you even talking about?

inn.message: Inn Owner: Thanks for your money. You HP and Mana are fully restored now!
inn.denymsg: Inn Owner: You don't have enough money!

ron.message: Ron the Questgiver: Hello there! I have quests for new adventurers. If you bring me 75 venoms, I can give you a new weapon. Just type /talk ron:venom.
ron.notopic: Ron the Questgiver: Wuh... what? I have too many quests for this!

venom.message: Ron the Questgiver: Thanks! Here's a venom blade for your troubles.
venom.denymsg: Ron the Questgiver: You don't have 75 venoms! What is this? Gtfo!

cave.name: Dark Cave
cave.info: A cave where darkness reigns. Dangerous monsters may lurk around. (level 5-12)
cave.welcome: The darkness is absolute here. You can barely see what's ahead of you! You have heard tales of creatures killing adventurers who enter.

grave.name: Graveyard
grave.info: There's a mist at the entrance of the Graveyard. You can almost see some shapes moving in the distance, but... They aren't human. (level 11-20)
grave.welcome: You entered the Graveyard! You hear strange sounds and a chill goes down your spine... Explore at your own risk. You see a tall, skinny man with a shovel not too far away...

mort.message: Mort the Digger: Hello... You must be a new adventurer.. I have a couple favors to ask of you... Why yes... I need you to bring me 50 rotten fleshes.. Why? Well, I don't see how that's any of your concern... do /t mort:feast when you have them. I... also need you to clear out my graveyard. There are too many zombies and skeletons roaming around... They're not letting me sleep... Start by doing /t mort:pets.

feast.message: Mort the Digger: Ahahaha... Thank you! I shall indeed have a feast tonight...
feast.denymsg: Mort the Digger: More... Bring me more flesh...

pets.message: Mort the Digger: ...Thank you for clearing up the graveyard... My pets always make such a ruckus...
pets.denymsg: Mort the Digger: My pets are still out there moaning..

crypt.name: Crypt
crypt.info: A crypt lies in the middle of the graveyard. (level 16-20)
crypt.welcome: You have found an old crypt near the middle of the Graveyard. While the sounds were ominous outside, there is an eerie silence that pierces your soul here. You see a sign with the symbols of the necromancer all over it.

catacomb.name: Catacomb
catacomb.info: There's a door leading somewhere on the side of the crypt. The door is locked though, and is too heavy to break through. Perhaps somene has a key..(level 19+)
catacomb.welcome: The symbols of the necromancer are everywhere. The stench in the air is that of decaying flesh. You can strange chanting coming from all directions...

forest.name: Happy Forest
forest.info: On the edge of a steep cliff, the lush earth meets open sky. (level 22+)
forest.welcome: Watch your step! No matter what may be prowling around here, you can't lose your focus, or you might find yourself in pieces at the bottom of the cliff.

edge.name: Felicitous Forest
edge.info: Right on the edge, this part of the forest is brighter than ever. (level 28+)
edge.welcome: You're even close to the cliff edge now! Watch out, because any creature here won't think twice about pushing you over it...

tree.name: Cliffside Tree
tree.info: This tree precariously hangs over the edge of the cliff. Only the most courageous of explorers dare climb it. (level 32+)

sky.name: Sky
sky.info: The sky isn't even the limit here. (level 40+)
sky.welcome: After climbing up through the highest Tree in the forest, you reach the Sky. The clouds are able to sustain weight and there are powerful enemies here. Time to walk on sunshine!

hill.name: Rabbit Hill
hill.info: A grassy hill with a faint carrot smell.(level 1+)
hill.welcome: A familiar carrot smell wafts in the gentle breeze. An energetic man waves at you! Try talking to him with /t!

peter.message: Peter the Energetic: Hello there! I have a couple quests for new adventurers. If you bring me 3 cottons, I can give you a new armor. Just type /talk peter:cotton. I also have a quest for you to kill those troublesome rabbits. just do /talk peter:rabbit.
peter.notopic: Peter the Energetic: Wuh... what? This isn't right. Try again.

cotton.message: Peter the Energetic: Thanks! Here's a cotton robe for your troubles.
cotton.denymsg: Peter the Energetic: You don't have 3 cottons! D: Go away!

rabbit.message: Peter the Energetic: Good job! You cleared out the rabbits. Here's some money for your troubles.
rabbit.denymsg: Peter the Energetic: The rabbits are still running rampant. Please kill 5 normal rabbits, 3 grey rabbits, 2 white rabbit and 1 large rabbit.

cave b1.name: Dark Cave B1
cave b1.info: The lower levels of the cave. Many aloof adventurers' bodies may be found here, as well as some of their belongings. (level 9-13)
cave b1.welcome: You have made your way to the lower levels of the cave. Only the strongest of adventurers can survive here.
